Name: Concussion
Effect: Disadvantage on Logic/Focus checks. Cannot maintain Concentration.

Name: Broken Ribs
Effect: Max Stamina reduced by 5. Disadvantage on Fortitude saves.

Name: Deep Gash
Effect: Gain Bleeding status at combat start (1d4 Dmg/turn) until bandaged.

Name: Fractured Arm
Effect: Cannot use Two-Handed weapons or Shields. Off-hand disabled.

Name: Hobbled
Effect: Movement Speed halved. Cannot Dash or Sprint.

Name: Eye Injury
Effect: Disadvantage on Ranged Attacks and Perception. 50% chance permanent.

Name: Paranoia
Effect: Cannot benefit from Assist action or Flanking bonuses.

Name: Craven
Effect: Taking damage triggers Willpower save (DC 12) or Disengage.

Name: Hesitation
Effect: Cannot take Reactions (Block, Parry, Opportunity Attacks).

Name: Obsession
Effect: GM picks one goal. Regain 0 Focus during Rests unless pursuing it.

Name: Despair
Effect: Cannot use Luck points or Reroll abilities.
